bug.short_desc: mock fails when the current working directory name contains spaces.
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
> pwd
/home/terrycloth/Creating/packaging/GNOME Shell Extensions
> mock --buildsrpm --spec ./gnome-shell-extension-no-top-left-hot-corner.spec --sources ./ --resultdir ./builds/
INFO: mock.py version 1.2.21 starting (python version = 3.5.1)... Start: init plugins INFO: selinux enabled Finish: init plugins Start: run INFO: Start(./gnome-shell-extension-no-top-left-hot-corner.spec) Config(fedora-24-x86_64) Start: clean chroot Finish: clean chroot Start: chroot init INFO: calling preinit hooks INFO: enabled root cache Start: unpacking root cache /usr/bin/stat: cannot read file system information for '/home/terrycloth/Creating/packaging/GNOME': No such file or directory /usr/bin/stat: cannot read file system information for 'Shell': No such file or directory /usr/bin/stat: cannot read file system information for 'Extensions': No such file or directory

I have upgraded to mock 1.3.2 and Fedora 25.
mock still complains when the current working directory name contains spaces, though now it seems to finish building the RPMs anyway.
$ pwd
/home/terrycloth/Creating/packaging/Activities Configurator
$ mock --buildsrpm --spec ./gnome-shell-extension-activities-configurator.spec --sources ./ --resultdir ./ --no-clean
INFO: mock.py version 1.3.2 starting (python version = 3.5.2)... Start: init plugins INFO: selinux enabled Finish: init plugins Start: run INFO: Start(./gnome-shell-extension-activities-configurator.spec) Config(fedora-25-x86_64) Start: chroot init INFO: calling preinit hooks INFO: enabled root cache INFO: enabled dnf cache Start: cleaning dnf metadata Finish: cleaning dnf metadata Mock Version: 1.3.2 INFO: Mock Version: 1.3.2 Finish: chroot init Start: buildsrpm Start: rpmbuild -bs Building target platforms: x86_64 Building for target x86_64 Wrote: /builddir/build/SRPMS/gnome-shell-extension-activities-configurator-52-1.fc25.src.rpm Finish: rpmbuild -bs Finish: buildsrpm INFO: Done(./gnome-shell-extension-activities-configurator.spec) Config(default) 0 minutes 6 seconds INFO: Results and/or logs in: ./ INFO: Cleaning up build root ('cleanup_on_success=True') Start: clean chroot Finish: clean chroot Finish: run INFO: mock.py version 1.3.2 starting (python version = 3.5.2)... Start: init plugins INFO: selinux enabled Finish: init plugins Start: run INFO: Start(./gnome-shell-extension-activities-configurator-52-1.fc24.src.rpm) Config(fedora-25-x86_64) Start: chroot init INFO: calling preinit hooks INFO: enabled root cache Start: unpacking root cache /usr/bin/stat: cannot read file system information for '/home/terrycloth/Creating/packaging/Activities': No such file or directory /usr/bin/stat: cannot read file system information for 'Configurator': No such file or directory Finish: unpacking root cache INFO: enabled dnf cache Start: cleaning dnf metadata Finish: cleaning dnf metadata
